text: Elastic network interface WS academy * An elastic network interface is a virtual network interface that you can: « Attach to an instance. Detach from the instance, and attach to another instance to redirect network traffic. « |ts attributes follow when it is reattached to a new instance. * Each instance in your VPC has a default network interface that is assigned a private IPv4 address from the IPv4 address range of your VPC. .Suhnec1.0/24 Elastic netw
